# `LearningModuleAutoAssignRequest` Definition

Auto assign request

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| ruleId | `string` | Yes | The id of the rule |
| enabled | `boolean` | Yes | Whether the rule is enabled for the module |
